name: the one where Ricardo wants to delete an owner using the clinic API
scenarioId: classpath:features/owners/manage_owners:the one where Ricardo wants to delete an owner using the clinic API
methodName: the one where Ricardo wants to delete an owner using the clinic API

testSteps.description:
Given Kelly has registered the following owner in the system
| firstName | lastName | address | city | phone |
| Daniela | Smith | new-york-street 123 | New York | 124219862 |
When Ricardo sends a request to delete Daniela Smith using the clinic API

children.description: Ricardo executes a DELETE on the resource /owners/{ownerId}

restQuery.responseHeaders:
Allow: GET, PUT
vary: accept-encoding
Content-Encoding: gzip
Content-Type: application/json;charset=UTF-8
Transfer-Encoding: chunked
Date: Mon, 16 Sep 2024 23:59:15 GMT

testSteps.description: Then the system should return a 200 response code

children.description: For Ricardo: Then the response status should be (200)

testSteps.description: And the owner should not be listed in the system anymore

userStory.storyName: The Pet Clinic should allow to manage the owners information
userStory.displayName: The Pet Clinic should allow to manage the owners information
userStory.narrative:
As a VetClinic Manager
  I would like to be able to manage the owners information
  In order to handle all the pets and visits made by them

title: the one where Ricardo wants to delete an owner using the clinic API

rule.name: The system should allow to delete an owner registered in the system

     but: was <405>
